name: 轉生打怪學英文(五)(Adventure and study English in a fantasy world)
name_original: 轉生打怪學英文(五)(Adventure and study English in a fantasy world)
description:
(I) What kind of work is this (dual setting)?

(1) Adventure and learning
This is an open-ended RPG adventure game. You can adventure if you want, and you can learn if you want.This is also a game with an interesting story and touching plot.Of course, this must be a game full of beautiful girls and boys.

(2) Go to learn

This is also a tool game for "helping to memorize vocabulary".The content includes 1200 advanced vocabulary words shared by IELTS and TOEFL.This is the fifth game in the "Reincarnation Monster Learning English" series. The rest of the games in the series will be released gradually throughout this year.
Whether you are a high school student or a working adult...;This is definitely the best tool to "improve English skills", and it is also a game that can be collected for a lifetime.


(II) How to start playing this game

Once you enter the game, decide on the protagonist's gender and occupation, and then you can start your free adventure.

There are two ways to play the game:

(1) To get the best gaming experience:

Adventure, fight monsters, and save people in the traditional RPG game way. If you encounter a small level that you can't pass, you can look it up in the dictionary. Of course, it will be more fun to find friends or classmates to brainstorm together when you pass the level.

(2) To get the best learning experience:

This game collects 1200 advanced vocabulary words that are often tested in IELTS and TOEFL. According to the guidance of the game settings, you can memorize English vocabulary while solving world tasks (you can also pass the level without learning).


(III) What will you gain after finishing the game?

(1) You will have the fun of playing the game.

(2) You will be familiar with the 1200 advanced vocabulary words.

(3) If you have a vocabulary of more than 8000 words, you will be equivalent to the fourth level of professional English (TEM-4), the intermediate level of the General English Proficiency Test (GEPT) in Taiwan, and you can step into the threshold of high scores in IELTS and TOEFL.
